divs: sighting details my wife and i were going to columbia sc,to look at homes. it was around 7 to 8 pm. we saw a glare to our right at s\w. we thought it was the setting sun reflecting on a stainless plane. all of a sudden a sphere was to our right. it was about 300to400 feet up. sitting there at what seemed like 2to4 minutes.it then shot across the road to our left at a little bit higher level. sitting there for a short time [15 to 30seconds] it disappered in a flash, we did not see where it went because it was gone in an instant. i am making a drawing and will mail later. thanks {pid}
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Rock Hill
There were no other sightings in Rock Hill on or around April 10th 2003
Summary: Round w/points size of beach ball/then doubled color was a burnt red.
